name: AudioBuffer
desc: Holds and describes a buffer of audio data.

items.name: init(mNumberChannels: UInt32, mDataByteSize: UInt32, mData: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?)
var mData: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?
items.desc: A pointer to a buffer of audio data.

items.name: var mDataByteSize: UInt32
items.desc: The number of bytes in the buffer pointed at by the mData field.

items.name: var mNumberChannels: UInt32
items.desc: The number of interleaved channels in the buffer. If the number is 1, the buffer is noninterleaved.
